word: Day Two: There could not be found standing room for all who would come in. A crowd filled the aisle and around the door. They listened with the deepest interest. The hall was so densely packed one woman fainted. . . . Accommodations for places of meetings are not healthy or safe.--Ms 26, 1885, p. 7. (First Visit to Sweden, diary October 15 to 30, 1885.)
